metadata.title: CVE-2024-43909 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:drm/amdgpu/pm: Fix the null pointer dereference for smu7optimize the code to avoid pass a null pointer (hwmgr->backend)to function smu7_update_edc_leakage_table.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'ESM criteria, was needed').
